Name: maximize_story_points
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed in a sprint.

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall duration of the project from start to finish.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize and complete features with the highest business value first.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the self-reported satisfaction level of the team during retrospectives.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact of impediments by addressing high-severity blockers quickly.

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Achieve a positive and increasing trend in the team's velocity over time.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieving the defined sprint goal.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort (in hours or days) required to complete all tasks in a sprint.

Name: maximize_budget_utilization
Description: Maximize the effective use of the allocated project budget.

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of blockers that are not in a 'resolved' status.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the available working time of all team members.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with high influence.

Name: maximize_test_status_success
Description: Maximize the number of development snapshots that pass testing successfully.
